description.en: This course will support incoming students with learning and networking in Estonia. The course gives first insights of the Estonian culture, education and the good practice of learning and teaching in University of Tartu. It includes a joint study visits. In addition to that students will become acquainted with the OLE ROHKEM student organisations network, which will help find local events and contacts.
description.et: Kursus toetab välisüliõpilasi õppimises ja võrgustumises Eestis. Kursus võimaldab saada esmase ülevaate Eesti kultuuri- ja haridusloost ning õppimise ja õpetamise heast tavast Tartu Ülikoolis. Kursuse juurde kuuluvad õppekäigud. Lisaks tutvutakse OLE ROHKEM tudengiorganisatsioonide võrgustikuga, mis aitab leida õpirännet rikastavaid kohapealseid kontakte ning tegevusi.

objectives.en: The aim of the course is to give international students the foundation and tools for successful studies abroad, focusing on the country of destination - Estonia's culture and education system, together with becoming acquainted with local students' networks and traditions.
objectives.et: Kursuse eesmärgiks on anda välisüliõpilastele lähtekohad ja tööriistad edukaks õpirändeks, keskendudes Eesti, kui sihtriigi, kultuuri ning haridussüsteemi temaatikale - sealhulgas ka kohalike tudengite võrgustiku ja tavade tundmaõppimisele.

objectives.en: On-site visits will deepen the understanding about the host country and networking throughout the mobility period supports and enriches the learning journey.
objectives.et: Tegemist on läbi semestri toimuva kursusega, sh õppevisiidid ja tekkiv võrgustik, mis toetavad ja rikastavad õpiteekonda kogu mobiilsuse perioodil.

learning_outcomes.en: On completion of the course students:
1)  know the basics of Estonian culture and education;
learning_outcomes.et: 1)	tunnevad Eesti kultuuri- ja haridusloo aluseid;

learning_outcomes.en: 2)  describe and apply good practice of learning and teaching in University of Tartu's academic culture;
learning_outcomes.et: 2)	kirjeldavad ja rakendavad õppimise ja õpetamise head tava Tartu Ülikooli akadeemilises kultuuris;

learning_outcomes.en: 3)  participate in local activities/events and reflect on their experiences of studying abroad in a learning diary.
learning_outcomes.et: 3)	võtavad osa kohalikest tegevustest/üritustest ja reflekteerivad oma välisõppe kogemuse üle õpipäevikus.

independent_work.et:
- Study diary (reflections on local culture, studies and networking)
- Comparative analysis of the curriculum at the home university and University of Tartu
- Introduction of a sight/attraction/institution in Tartu during the city tour
- Taking part of one event of a student organisation in Tartu or the Student Days program

More detailed explanations of the independent works are provided in the Moodle environment.

grade_preconditions.et:
- Submission of the study tasks in Moodle to a positive result
- Taking part in at least one of the on-site visits
- Presenting the study diary

grade_evaluation.et: The result of passing the subject is formed on the basis of independent works and participation in the classes

debt_elimination.et: By agreement with the lecturer in accordance with the study regulations of University of Tartu
